entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 30 April 2023
